subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Tampering rules prevent Brian Cashman from speaking about a possible pursuit of Roy Halladay, but the Yankees’ manager made clear he did not want to deplete his farm system in a trade.
snippet: Tampering rules prevent Brian Cashman from speaking about a possible pursuit of Roy Halladay, but the Yankees’ manager made clear he did not want to deplete his farm system in a trade.
